name: Superposition (redshirt_gaming, diegomgomez, reydanro)
description:
Superposition is a puzzle-platformer where you control multiple entangled particles at once to get them to the goal. It was entirely built in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Controls:

AD / Arrows to move
W / Space to jump
R to restart the level
